mdRecord.dcterms:title: R.O.T.C. Army
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Notation on back, "Lieutenant Colonel Thomas A. Lindley, professor of military science and tactics at the University of Virginia, and Mrs. H.N. Teasley, Sr., pinning the bars on early on newly commissioned second lieutenant, Harry N. Teasley, Jr. Looking on is H.N. Teasley, Sr."
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
